About.title: KAN CHANCHIN
About.description: Amicizia Life Science hian Poultry, Livestock & Aqua culture sector-a player rintlak & ngaihsan tak nih tumin a inpeih a, customer te hnena thil danglam bik & quality tha tak tak a pe chhuak a ni. Solution thar rawn keng turin kan inpe a, Veterinary hman atan GMP & ISO accredited sterile manufacturing facility-a siam thil danglam tak tak kan pe bawk.

MissionVision.mission_desc: Veterinary pharmaceuticals & nutritional products danglam tak tak, creative & innovative taka siam chhuah, quality standard sang tak hnuaia kan end customer te hnena kan pek theihna tur solution tha ber pek theihna tur pe turin.
MissionVision.vision_desc: Animal Health Pharmaceutical Company hmahruaitu zinga mi nih tur, sales lamah chauh ni lovin thil thar siamna, value creation leh process excellence lamah pawh social responsibility hriatna sang tak nei turin.
